item.title: How to Edit Tags in a Hugo Blog
item.description: This tutorial covers: 1. How to Add Tags to a Hugo Blog Post 2. How to Edit the Tags Page in the Archie Theme 3. How to Edit Tags on a Blog Page How to Add Tags to a Hugo Blog Post Step 1: Open one of your Hugo blog post index.md files, and in the front matter insert the following: tags: [tag1, tag2] Make sure to capitalize and alphabetize the tags, as Hugo does not do this automatically.
